constituent: undefiled, water, water droplets, water pistol, flick knife, grow up, sword, dagger, thread, spiderman
koohiiStory1: To ensure she remained undefiled, a young girl growing up in a rough area always kept a dagger concealed under her threads, even when she went into the water.
koohiiStory2: (rgravina) To ensure she remained undefiled, a young girl growing up in a rough area always kept a dagger concealed under her Spiderman underwear (to remember the position of thread), even when she went into the water.
